Introduction of foundation.game ​

Game guide documentation project for Foundation: Galactic Frontier.

English content is being prepared. Please use the Simplified Chinese version first.

Project Structure ​

  • SimplifiedChinese/ Simplified Chinese guide documents (main content)
  • TraditionalChinese/ Traditional Chinese guide documents
  • English/ English guide documents
  • FOR_OpenClaw/Translate/ Translation status tracking (internal)

Readme by Language ​

  • 简体中文版入口：SimplifiedChinese/readme.md
  • 繁体中文版入口：TraditionalChinese/readme.md
  • English entry: English/readme.md

Translation ​

Translation progress and notes are tracked in FOR_OpenClaw/Translate/README.md.
